blocks.name: sigarval
blocks.content: Define the signed area by treating complex numbers as vectors with two components. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 19-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigarval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  ovmpt2a(s0, s1, c0, cc, c1, cc, c2, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1))))
  fveq2d(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)), co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  oveq12d(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1), cfv(ccj, c0), c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  fveq2d(ccj, cv(s0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  simpr(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  fvex(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1))
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1))
  diff.cim.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccj, c0)
  diff.ccj.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1))
  diff.cim.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ccj, c0)
  diff.ccj.s(s1)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sigarval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)→(c0[c2]c1)=(Im `((* ` c0)[×]c1)))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ ℂ, s1 ∈ ℂ ↦(Im `((* ` s0)[×]s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  ovmpt2a(s0, s1, c0, cc, c1, cc, c2, (Im `((* ` c0)[×]c1)), (Im `((* ` s0)[×]s1)))
  fveq2d(cim, ((* ` s0)[×]s1), ((* ` c0)[×]c1), (s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c1))
  oveq12d((* ` s0), cmul, s1, (* ` c0), c1, (s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c1))
  fveq2d(ccj, s0, c0, (s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c1))
  simpl(s0 = c0, s1 = c1)
  simpr(s0 = c0, s1 = c1)
  fvex(cim, ((* ` c0)[×]c1))
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cim, ((* ` c0)[×]c1))
  diff.cim.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, (* ` c0), cmul, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccj, c0)
  diff.ccj.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cim, ((* ` c0)[×]c1))
  diff.cim.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, (* ` c0), cmul, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ccj, c0)
  diff.ccj.s(s1)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: sigarim
blocks.content: Signed area takes value in reals. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 19-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigarim(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c0, c2, c1), cr))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, c2, c1), cr, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  sigarval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  imcld(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  mulcld(cfv(ccj, c0), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  cjcld(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sigarim(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)→(c0[c2]c1)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ ℂ, s1 ∈ ℂ ↦(Im `((* ` s0)[×]s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[c2]c1), cr, (Im `((* ` c0)[×]c1)), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  sigarval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  imcld(((* ` c0)[×]c1), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  mulcld((* ` c0), c1, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  cjcld(c0, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  simpl(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
}

blocks.name: sigarac
blocks.content: Signed area is anticommutative. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 19-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigarac(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), cneg(co(c1, c2, c0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqtr4d(co(c0, c2, c1), cneg(co(c1, c2, c0)), cneg(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c1), cmul, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  3eqtrd(co(c0, c2, c1), cneg(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c1), cmul, c0))), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), cfv(cim, cfv(ccj, co(cfv(ccj, c1), cmul, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  sigarval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  fveq2d(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), cfv(ccj, co(cfv(ccj, c1), cmul, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  3eqtrrd(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), cfv(ccj, co(cfv(ccj, c1), cmul, c0)), co(cfv(ccj, cfv(ccj, c1)), cmul, cfv(ccj, c0)), co(c1, cmul, cfv(ccj, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  cjmuld(cfv(ccj, c1), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  oveq1d(cfv(ccj, cfv(ccj, c1)), cmul, cfv(ccj, c0), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  cjcjd(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  mulcomd(c1, cfv(ccj, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  cjcld(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  imcjd(co(cfv(ccj, c1), cmul, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  mulcld(cfv(ccj, c1), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cfv(ccj, c1), cc))
  cjcl(c1)
  simpl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  negeqd(co(c1, c2, c0), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c1), cmul, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(c1, c2, c0), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c1), cmul, c0))))
  sigarval(s0, s1, c1, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: sigaraf
blocks.content: Signed area is additive by the first argument. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 19-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigaraf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), c3, c1), co(co(c0, c3, c1), caddc, co(c2, c3, c1))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), c3, c1), co(co(c0, c3, c1), caddc, co(c2, c3, c1)), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, caddc, c2)), cmul, c1)), co(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), caddc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  eqtrd(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, caddc, c2)), cmul, c1)), co(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), caddc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1))), cfv(cim, co(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), caddc, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  fveq2d(cim, co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, caddc, c2)), cmul, c1), co(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), caddc, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, caddc, c2)), cmul, c1), co(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), caddc, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1)), co(co(cfv(ccj, c0), caddc, cfv(ccj, c2)), cmul, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, caddc, c2)), cmul, c1), co(co(cfv(ccj, c0), caddc, cfv(ccj, c2)), cmul, c1)))
  oveq1d(cfv(ccj, co(c0, caddc, c2)), cmul, c1, co(cfv(ccj, c0), caddc, cfv(ccj, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  cjadd(c0, c2)
  adddird(cfv(ccj, c0), cfv(ccj, c2), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  imaddd(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  mulcld(cfv(ccj, c0), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  cjcld(c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  mulcld(cfv(ccj, c2), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  cjcld(c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), c3, c1), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, caddc, c2)), cmul, c1))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c2), cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  addcld(c0, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  sigarval(s0, s1, co(c0, caddc, c2), c1, c3)
  oveq12d(co(c0, c3, c1), caddc, co(c2, c3, c1), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(c0, c3, c1), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1))))
  sigarval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c2, c3, c1), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1))), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  ancomd(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  3simpc(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  sigarval(s0, s1, c2, c1, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, caddc, c2)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, caddc, c2)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: sigarmf
blocks.content: Signed area is additive (with respect to subtraction) by the first argument. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 19-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigarmf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), c3, c1), co(co(c0, c3, c1), cmin, co(c2, c3, c1))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), c3, c1), co(co(c0, c3, c1), cmin, co(c2, c3, c1)), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c2)), cmul, c1)), co(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), cmin, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  eqtrd(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c2)), cmul, c1)), co(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), cmin, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1))), cfv(cim, co(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), cmin, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  fveq2d(cim, co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c2)), cmul, c1), co(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), cmin, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c2)), cmul, c1), co(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), cmin, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1)), co(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmin, cfv(ccj, c2)), cmul, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c2)), cmul, c1), co(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmin, cfv(ccj, c2)), cmul, c1)))
  oveq1d(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c2)), cmul, c1, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmin, cfv(ccj, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  cjsub(c0, c2)
  subdird(cfv(ccj, c0), cfv(ccj, c2), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  imsubd(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  mulcld(cfv(ccj, c0), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  cjcld(c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  mulcld(cfv(ccj, c2), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  cjcld(c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), c3, c1), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c2)), cmul, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c2), cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  subcld(c0, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  sigarval(s0, s1, co(c0, cmin, c2), c1, c3)
  oveq12d(co(c0, c3, c1), cmin, co(c2, c3, c1), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(c0, c3, c1), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1))))
  sigarval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c2, c3, c1), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c2), cmul, c1))), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  ancomd(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  3simpc(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  sigarval(s0, s1, c2, c1, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmin, c2)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cmin, c2)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: sigaras
blocks.content: Signed area is additive by the second argument. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 19-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigaras(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c0, c3, co(c1, caddc, c2)), co(co(c0, c3, c1), caddc, co(c0, c3, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {

blocks.name: sigarls
blocks.content: Signed area is linear by the second argument. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 19-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigarls(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, c3, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, c3, c1), cmul, c2), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2))), co(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), cmul, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cr)))

  fveq2d(cim, co(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), cmul, c2), co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cr)))
  mulassd(cfv(ccj, c0), c1, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cr)))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cim, co(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), cmul, c2)), co(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), cmul, c2), cfv(cim, co(c2, cmul, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1))), co(c2, cmul, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cr)))

  fveq2d(cim, co(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cr)))

  mulcomd(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cr)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), cc), wcel(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcld(cfv(ccj, c0), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cr)))
  cjcld(c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cr)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cr))
  recnd(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1)), wcel(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1), cc))
  imcl(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c1))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c2, cc))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cr)), wceq(co(c0, c3, co(c1, cmul, c2)), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2)))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cc))

blocks.name: sigarid
blocks.content: Signed area of a flat parallelogram is zero. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 20-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigarid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(c0, c1, c0), nat0))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, c1, c0), nat0, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  anidms(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(c0, c1, c0), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c0))))
  sigarval(s0, s1, c0, c0, c1)
  reim0d(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  eqeltrd(co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, c0), cr, co(c0, cmul, cfv(ccj, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  mulcomd(cfv(ccj, c0), c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  cjcl(c0)
  id(wcel(c0, cc))
  cjmulrcl(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sigarid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℂ →(c0[c1]c0)= 0)
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℂ, s1 ∈ ℂ ↦(Im `((* ` s0)[×]s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[c1]c0), nat0, (Im `((* ` c0)[×]c0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  anidms(c0 ∈ ℂ, (c0[c1]c0)=(Im `((* ` c0)[×]c0)))
  sigarval(s0, s1, c0, c0, c1)
  reim0d(((* ` c0)[×]c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  eqeltrd(((* ` c0)[×]c0), cr, (c0[×](* ` c0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  mulcomd((* ` c0), c0, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  cjcl(c0)
  id(c0 ∈ ℂ)
  cjmulrcl(c0)
}

thm sigarexp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), c3, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(co(c0, c3, c1), cmin, co(c0, c3, c2)), cmin, co(c2, c3, c1)), co(co(c0, c3, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cmin, co(c2, c3, co(c1, cmin, c2))), co(co(co(c0, c3, c1), cmin, co(c0, c3, c2)), cmin, co(c2, c3, co(c1, cmin, c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syld3an2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), c3, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(c0, c3, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cmin, co(c2, c3, co(c1, cmin, c2)))), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cc))
  subcld(c1, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  sigarmf(s0, s1, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2), c2, c3)
  oveq1d(co(c0, c3, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cmin, co(c2, c3, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(c0, c3, c1), cmin, co(c0, c3, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  sigarms(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  oveq2d(co(co(c0, c3, c1), cmin, co(c0, c3, c2)), cmin, co(c2, c3, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(c2, c3, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))

  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c2, c3, c2), nat0), wcel(c2, cc))

}

blocks.name: sigarperm
blocks.content: Signed area ` ( A - C ) G ( B - C ) ` acts as a double area of a triangle ` A B C ` . Here we prove that cyclically permuting the vertices doesn't change the area. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 20-Sep-2017.)

thm sigarperm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), c3, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(c1, cmin, c0), c3, co(c2, cmin, c0))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4rd(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), c3, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(c1, cmin, c0), c3, co(c2, cmin, c0)), co(co(co(c1, c3, c2), cmin, co(c1, c3, c0)), cmin, co(c0, c3, c2)), co(co(co(c1, c3, c2), caddc, co(c0, c3, c1)), cmin, co(c0, c3, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))

  eqtr3d(co(co(c1, c3, c2), cmin, co(c1, c3, c0)), co(co(c1, c3, c2), caddc, co(c0, c3, c1)), co(co(c1, c3, c2), caddc, cneg(co(c1, c3, c0))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  negsubd(co(c1, c3, c2), co(c1, c3, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c1, c3, c0), cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc))
  recnd(co(c1, c3, c0), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  sigarim(s0, s1, c1, c0, c3)
  oveq2d(co(c1, c3, c2), caddc, cneg(co(c1, c3, c0)), co(c0, c3, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  eqcomd(cneg(co(c1, c3, c0)), co(c0, c3, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c0, c3, c1), cneg(co(c1, c3, c0))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  sigarac(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3)
  3comr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), c3, co(c2, cmin, c0)), co(co(co(c1, c3, c2), cmin, co(c1, c3, c0)), cmin, co(c0, c3, c2))))
  sigarexp(s0, s1, c1, c2, c0, c3)
  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), c3, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(co(c1, c3, c2), caddc, co(c0, c3, c1)), cmin, co(c0, c3, c2)), co(co(co(c0, c3, c1), cmin, co(c0, c3, c2)), cmin, co(c2, c3, c1)), co(co(co(c0, c3, c1), cmin, co(c2, c3, c1)), cmin, co(c0, c3, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  sigarexp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  sub32d(co(c0, c3, c1), co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  recnd(co(c0, c3, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c0, c3, c2), cr), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  sigarim(s0, s1, c0, c2, c3)
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, c3, c1), cmin, co(c2, c3, c1)), cmin, co(c0, c3, c2), co(co(c1, c3, c2), caddc, co(c0, c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3eqtr2rd(co(co(c0, c3, c1), cmin, co(c2, c3, c1)), co(co(c1, c3, c2), caddc, co(c0, c3, c1)), co(co(c0, c3, c1), caddc, co(c1, c3, c2)), co(co(c0, c3, c1), caddc, cneg(co(c2, c3, c1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  addcomd(co(c1, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))

  recnd(co(c1, c3, c2), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  sigarim(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)
  oveq2d(co(c0, c3, c1), caddc, cneg(co(c2, c3, c1)), co(c1, c3, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  eqcomd(cneg(co(c2, c3, c1)), co(c1, c3, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c2), cneg(co(c2, c3, c1))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  sigarac(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)
  negsubd(co(c0, c3, c1), co(c2, c3, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  recnd(co(c0, c3, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c0, c3, c1), cr), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  sigarim(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3)
  recnd(co(c2, c3, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c2, c3, c1), cr), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  sigarim(s0, s1, c2, c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: sigardiv
blocks.content: If signed area between vectors ` B - A ` and ` C - A ` is zero, then those vectors lie on the same line. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 22-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigardiv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c1)), cr))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, w3a(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wceq(c2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), c3, co(c2, cmin, c1)), nat0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c1)), cr, cfv(ccj, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c1))), w0)
  eqtr3d(cfv(ccj, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c1))), co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c1)), cfv(ccj, cfv(ccj, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c1)))), w0)
  cjred(cfv(ccj, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c1))), w0)
  cjcjd(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c1)), w0)
  divcld(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1), w0)
  eqeltrd(cfv(ccj, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c1))), cr, co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, cfv(ccj, co(c2, cmin, c1))), w0)
  cjdivd(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1), w0)
  eqeltrrd(co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, cfv(ccj, co(c2, cmin, c1))), cr, co(co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c1)), cdiv, co(cfv(ccj, co(c2, cmin, c1)), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c1))), w0)
  divcan5rd(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(c2, cmin, c1), cfv(ccj, co(c2, cmin, c1)), w0)
  redivcld(co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c1)), co(cfv(ccj, co(c2, cmin, c1)), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c1)), w0)
  reim0bd(co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c1)), w0)
  mulcld(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(c2, cmin, c1), w0)
  cjcld(co(c0, cmin, c1), w0)
  eqtr3d(cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c1))), nat0, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), c3, co(c2, cmin, c1)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), c3, co(c2, cmin, c1)), cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c1)))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c1), cc))
  subcld(c0, c1, w0)
  simp2d(w0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  sigarval(s0, s1, co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1), c3)
  eqeltrrd(co(cfv(ccj, co(c2, cmin, c1)), cmul, co(c2, cmin, c1)), cr, co(co(c2, cmin, c1), cmul, cfv(ccj, co(c2, cmin, c1))), w0)
  mulcomd(co(c2, cmin, c1), cfv(ccj, co(c2, cmin, c1)), w0)
  cjmulrcld(co(c2, cmin, c1), w0)
  mulne0d(cfv(ccj, co(c2, cmin, c1)), co(c2, cmin, c1), w0)
  cjcld(co(c2, cmin, c1), w0)
  cjne0d(co(c2, cmin, c1), w0)
  subcld(c2, c1, w0)

  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cmin, c1)

  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cmin, c1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, cmin, c1)

}

blocks.name: sigarimcd
blocks.content: Signed area takes value in complex numbers. Deduction version. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 23-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigarimcd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cc))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cc), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  recnd(co(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  sigarim(s0, s1, c0, c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sigarimcd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℂ, s1 ∈ ℂ ↦(Im `((* ` s0)[×]s1)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ∈ ℂ))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl(w0, (c0[c1]c2)∈ ℂ, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ∈ ℂ))
  recnd((c0[c1]c2), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ∈ ℂ))
  sigarim(s0, s1, c0, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: sigariz
blocks.content: If signed area is zero, the signed area with swapped arguments is also zero. Deduction version. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 23-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigariz(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), nat0))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, c1, c0), nat0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr3rd(co(c0, c1, c2), nat0, cneg(nat0), cneg(cneg(co(c0, c1, c2))), w0)
  negeqd(nat0, cneg(co(c0, c1, c2)), w0)
  eqtr3d(nat0, cneg(co(c0, c1, c2)), co(c2, c1, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(c2, c1, c0), cneg(co(c0, c1, c2))), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  sigarac(s0, s1, c2, c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cneg(nat0), nat0))
  neg0()
  negnegd(co(c0, c1, c2), w0)
  sigarimcd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  ancomd(w0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sigariz(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)= 0)
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℂ, s1 ∈ ℂ ↦(Im `((* ` s0)[×]s1)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ c0 ∈ ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2[c1]c0)= 0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr3rd((c0[c1]c2), nat0, -u(0), -u(-u((c0[c1]c2))), w0)
  negeqd(nat0, -u((c0[c1]c2)), w0)
  eqtr3d(nat0, -u((c0[c1]c2)), (c2[c1]c0), w0)
  syl(w0, (c2[c1]c0)= -u((c0[c1]c2)), (c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ c0 ∈ ℂ))
  sigarac(s0, s1, c2, c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, -u(0)= 0)
  neg0()
  negnegd((c0[c1]c2), w0)
  sigarimcd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  ancomd(w0, c0 ∈ ℂ, c2 ∈ ℂ)
}

blocks.name: sigarcol
blocks.content: Given three points ` A ` , ` B ` and ` C ` such that ` -. A = B ` , the point ` C ` lies on the line going through ` A ` and ` B ` iff the corresponding signed area is zero. That justifies the usage of signed area as a collinearity indicator. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 22-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigarcol(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2, co(c3, cmin, c1)), nat0), wrex(s0, cr, wceq(c1, co(c3, caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(c0, cmin, c3)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s1, s2, cc, cc, cfv(cim, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s1)), cmul, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wceq(c0, c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {

blocks.name: sharhght
blocks.content: Let ` A B C ` be a triangle, and let ` D ` lie on the line ` A B ` . Then (doubled) areas of triangles ` A D C ` and ` C D B ` relate as lengths of corresponding bases ` A D ` and ` D B ` . (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 23-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: sigaradd
blocks.content: Subtracting (double) area of ` A D C ` from ` A B C ` yields the (double) area of ` D B C ` . (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 23-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: cevath
blocks.content: Ceva's theorem. Let ` A B C ` be a triangle and let points ` F ` , ` D ` and ` E ` lie on sides ` A B ` , ` B C ` , ` C A ` correspondingly. Suppose that cevians ` A D ` , ` B E ` and ` C F ` intersect at one point ` O ` . Then triangle's sides are partitioned into segments and their lengths satisfy a certain identity. Here we obtain a bit stronger version by using complex numbers themselves instead of their absolute values. The proof goes by applying ~ cevathlem2 three times and then using ~ cevathlem1 to multiply obtained identities and prove the theorem. In the theorem statement we are using function ` G ` as a collinearity indicator. For justification of that use, see ~ sigarcol . This is Metamath 100 proof #61. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 24-Sep-2017.)
